name: Asteroids...ish (UP895383)
description:
The theme with this game is fairly self explanatory from the title.
The game was roughly based off of a strange chimera of these two tutorials, and my own pretty basic understanding of Gamemaker :

https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLlmV8hCw8wbkJEIcuN6f9JT1aZWLATHu-


https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLPRT_JORnIuo-DyoWbB7LBrhqlJnsltJq



Controlls: 
W - Thrust
S - Warp drive (teleports to a random location)

A - rotate left
D - rotate right

R - resets game 

You will be given an extra life at the end of every level
